19.post_text: Your favourite Beef and Chicken Samurai Burgers® are back in stores! Juicy patties, coated with our signature teriyaki sauce, topped off with crisp lettuce and a toasted sesame seed bun. Spice things up with our flaming Spicy Nuggets or enjoy a cool Coffee McFlurry® with Oreo® Cookies. What’s more, we have close to 4 million prizes up for grabs with every purchase! Get yours now at https://goo.gl/FtGr55.

comments.message:
Was having a midnight meal with my bf at Blk 163 AMK last night, when one of the staff came forward and said "we're not 24 hours" with an impolite tone, after we got our orders for about 10 mins. I was kind of unhappy with it and checked on the time stated on receipt when our orders were placed. It was 12.47am!
The same lady went outside to talked with the other customers, (I assume it was also regarding the closure) and they seemed unhappy too. 

The staffs then dimmed all the lights at 1am, hinting us that they're closing. We tried to finish the foods as soon as we can. 
Then, here comes their shift manager telling us that they're closing soon! My bf politely apologise and start stuffing all the french fries into his mouth, as he doesn't want to waste the food due to the chasing. 
When we were finally finishing the food, the staff switched off most of the lights at the seats area while still packing for delivery inside.

After I washed my hands, I went towards the counter wanting to ask for some serviette, everyone was busy packing for delivery/closing. So I decided to take it myself, as the packet of serviette were placed on the counter table and I didn't want to trouble them.
One of the cashier lady then made a big fuss about it and said "Excuse me?!" I told her I was just getting some serviette with a smile. She then said "Next time please ask!" with a super rude and annoyed face. 
I was like, what the hell?! What's so precious about the serviette? Do you even need to be so worked up?
Despite the poor customers service, I still somehow cleared up the table for the cleaner aunty.

I would say we're a super regular customers there. But due to this incident, I'll not go in as often anymore. 

P/S: If you guys are closing at 1am, then don't accept anymore dine in after 12.30am. It's not nice to chase customers off.
cant even reset password for mcdelivery . it been 5 day no email no nothing
Mcd.. where to check for 5 of the weekly chance card winners?
Stil unable to do online pymnt thru apps

Last week, when I patronize McD Clementi Mall the female supervisor commanded her kitchen staff like army, shouting at top of her voice. The cashier serving me said she was always like that. At my next visit when she emerged from the door, reporting for work, I thought Ohh no 😕. But I was surprise by her makeover. Although she can be heard hurrying the kitchen staff, she no longer raised her voice at the top of her lung.
Yesterday evening was worst experience.
We ordered 2 samurai + ice-lemon tea & happy meal +milo.  When starting to eat, my husband smelled faeces. He walked round and said smell from staircase and all the way on 2nd floor.  He  called staff.  When staff mopped, then I can smell the bad odour. 
Starting our meal, my husband asked to go home.  Going down staircase, at certain steps I can smell it.
When we reached home, my husband complained of stomach pain. I gave him bread - our family's solution to stomach upset. 30 minutes later I rushed to toilet, followed by my husband.  Fortunately my son is spared.
Between my husband & I, we drank tea & ate fries only. Not sure which one gave us the food poisoning
Since the seaweed powder fries promotion is over, why it still display on self purchase kiosk? Feeling sad when I purchased large size just because of it.
Device or No Device
Kfc then lol

20.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0530 hours on 16 November 2016. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.
